item.description: Join us for our monthly dog lover meet-up. All friendly dogs are welcome, families and friends encouraged to come! Meet-ups are scheduled for the 3rd Saturday of every month.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk, meet-ups are held in the doggy daycamp room.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Dog Lover meet-up group
